unnormalised: **EV Charging Heats Up – Just in Time for Diwali!**
normalised: E V Charging Heats Up – Just in Time for Diwali!

unnormalised: The EV scene in India is buzzing! Seems like everyone's scrambling to make charging easier, faster, and cheaper – just in time for the Diwali rush back home.
normalised: The E V scene in India is buzzing! Seems like everyone's scrambling to make charging easier, faster, and cheaper – just in time for the Diwali rush back home.

unnormalised: Ola Electric just announced a massive expansion of their Hypercharger network. Think more chargers popping up faster than you can say "biryani cravings on a road trip!" They're aiming for something like 10,000 points nationwide by next year.
normalised: Ola Electric just announced a massive expansion of their Hypercharger network. Think more chargers popping up faster than you can say "biryani cravings on a road trip!" They're aiming for something like ten thousand points nationwide by next year.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power's been busy too, installing chargers all over Mumbai and Bangalore. Imagine cruising down the highway, guilt-free, powered by clean energy!
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power's been busy too, installing chargers all over Mumbai and Bangalore. Imagine cruising down the highway, guilt-free, powered by clean energy!

unnormalised: And get this – IIT Madras is apparently working on some fancy new battery tech that could drastically cut charging times. We're talking topping up your Nexon EV while you grab a chai!
normalised: And get this – I I T Madras is apparently working on some fancy new battery tech that could drastically cut charging times. We're talking topping up your Nexon E V while you grab a chai!

unnormalised: Even smaller players are getting in on the action. Remember Sharmaji's garage from down the street? Word is he's considering adding a charging station – talk about embracing the future!
normalised: Even smaller players are getting in on the action. Remember Sharmaji's garage from down the street? Word is he's considering adding a charging station – talk about embracing the future!

unnormalised: The government's also chipping in, offering subsidies and tax breaks to encourage folks to switch to EVs. It’s like they’re trying to sweeten the deal even more than a Mysore Pak! Bottom line? Charging woes might soon be a thing of the past. Road trip to Kerala for Onam, anyone?
normalised: The government's also chipping in, offering subsidies and tax breaks to encourage folks to switch to E Vs. It’s like they’re trying to sweeten the deal even more than a Mysore Pak! Bottom line? Charging woes might soon be a thing of the past. Road trip to Kerala for Onam, anyone?
